comment: So I just got a new phone. And I know it's not the phone. But I go to Logan in my account. It gives me the option to relogate into My old account and I try pressing the button. It doesn't do anything so I have to back out. Try it again still doesn't do anything. So I uninstall it reinstall. It still won't let me click the button. So there's something wrong with the system. Maybe it needs an update. I'm not sure but after uninstalling it and reinstalling it. And it does the same exact thing 冒聼聵芦
